name: ESA
description: The European Space Agency is an intergovernmental organisation of 22 member states dedicated to the exploration of space.

name: NASA
description: The National Aeronautics and Space Administration is an independent agency of the U.S. federal government responsible for the civilian space program, as well as aeronautics and space research.

name: Roscosmos
description: The Roscosmos State Corporation for Space Activities, commonly known as Roscosmos, is the governmental body responsible for the space science program of the Russian Federation and general aerospace research.

name: SpaceX
description: Space Exploration Technologies Corp., known as SpaceX, is an American aerospace manufacturer and space transportation company founded by Elon Musk in 2002.
